title: ​VERA FILES FACT CHECK: Duterte’s recollection of own SONA inaccurate
subtitle: President Rodrigo Duterte claims he never talked about himself as president in his State of the Nation Addresses. He did several times.
author: verafiles.org
vclaim: President Rodrigo Duterte claims he never talked about himself as president in his State of the Nation Addresses. He did several times. Watch this video.
